original_text: Some people have left their homes. Or they may have left their brothers or sisters. Or they may have left their mother or their father. Or they may have left their wife or their children or their fields. They have done that because of me. God will give those people many more things than they have left behind, even 100 times more! And after they die, they will live for ever with God.
korean_text: 또 내 이름을 위하여 집이나 형제나 자매나 부모나 자식이나 전토를 버린 자마다 여러 배를 받고 또 영생을 상속하리라

sentences.original_text: Some people have left their homes.
Or they may have left their brothers or sisters.
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들의 형제나 자매를 떠났을지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: Or they may have left their mother or their father.
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들의 어머니나 아버지를 떠났을지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: Or they may have left their wife or their children
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들의 아내나 자녀들을 떠났을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: They have done that because of me.
God will give those people many more things
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 사람들에게 훨씬 더 많은 것들을 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: than they have left behind, even 100 times more!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 떠나둔 것보다, 심지어 100배나 더 많이!

sentences.original_text: And after they die, they will live for ever with God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 죽은 후에, 그들은 하나님과 함께 영원히 살 것입니다.
